Many analysts have said that only the Philadelphia Eagles speedster Michael Vick is better at scrambling with the football. He may not be as fast as Michael Vick , but he's certainly as dangerous because he will pull it down and get considerable yardage, and he will throw accurately like he is in the pocket, NFL Network analyst Steve Mariucci told www.nj.com.`` When he leaves the pocket, he's scary.''
